chapters.title: Chapter 37: The Last Battle
chapters.info: Lady Tinna, p. 635—Statuesque leader of the Dragonsworn. She has the bearing of a Lady, the build of an Aiel, and the coloring of a Saldaean. She is pretty, with long, curly, brown hair that she wears in a pony tail. She is strong of limb. She reminds Mat of Nynaeve, with the exception of carrying a sword.
